Paper.Title: Fatimah Dato' Ahmad Fakulti Sains Komputer &

Section.Paragraph: The Malaysian Language is a formation of subject, predicate and object. The subject is the noun that take the action on the object and the predicate is the verb phrase in the sentence. Without a good corpus that can provide the part of speech, parsing is a complex process. As an option to the parsing, this paper discusses a way to identify the subject and the predicate, known as the pola-grammar technique. A pola or a pattern to be identified in the sentence are the
